## Overview

We help demystify geospatial data for microeconomists. Through hands-on trainings and peer-learning events, we build core skills for microeconomists to use geospatial methods with confidence.

## Our Approach

Whether you're just getting started or looking to refine your toolkit, we're here to support you through our growing Community of Practice.
